content: ï»¿ Chentao Wu's Home Page Contact Address: Room 513, SEIEE-3 Building, 800 Dongchuan Road, Minhang District, Shanghai, China 200240 Telephone: (+86)21-34208230 Email: wuct@cs.sjtu.edu.cn or wuct@sjtu.edu.cn I am looking for self-motivated Undergraduate, Master, Ph.D. students and PostDocs. If you are interested in Data Storage Systems (Cloud Storage, Big Data Storage, Intelligent Storage, etc.), please feel free to contact me. Biography Chentao Wu is currently a full professor in the School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University, China. His research interests include data storage systems, particularly in reliable storage devices, data management in file sytems, cloud storage, intelligent storage, etc. He got his Ph.D degree from Virginia Commonwealth University (also referred to as Virginia State University) in 2012 and his advisor is Prof. Xubin (Ben) He. Prior to that, He got his Bachelor/Master/Ph.D. degrees all from Huazhong University of Science and Technology, under the supervision of Prof. Changsheng Xie, in 2004, 2006 and 2010, respectively.
